VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: super learning
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: Super-nanites alter the structure of the brain so that neurons are formed several times faster than usual. Greatly enhances one's learning ability.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: toxic resistance
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: Super-nanites modify the cells of the body so that they fight toxins of any kind, making one immune to them.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: psychic resistance
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: Super-nanites alter several centers of the brain. Such mutations make the user completely immune to psychic effects of any sort.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: regeneration
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: Super-nanites alter several genes to significantly speed up the regeneration of one's tissues. Such changes are not enough to regrow lost limbs.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: super speed
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: Super-nanites strengthen the musculoskeletal system to inhuman limits. Such changes allow one to move at a great speed.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: genius intellect
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: Super-nanites form billions of new synaptic connections. Such changes increase the performance of one's brain several times.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: weapons expert
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: Super-nanites alter several centers of the brain. Such changes significantly enhance fine motor skills, which allows the user to reload weapons twice as fast.
